name: How To Draw a Standing Duck
name_original: How To Draw a Standing Duck
description:
HOW TO DRAW A STANDING DUCK 

a small instructional game and poem with music by e.t. parcell

Move around with arrow keys or WASD. (On a phone, swipe in a direction to move)

Walk into blue things to interact with them. 

If you like the game, consider getting the soundtrack on bandcamp.

This is a sequel to the video HOW TO DRAW A SWIMMING DUCK.

Here are more ducks.

built with Bitsy by Adam LeDoux

with Bitsy HD hack by Fred Bednarski
